statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -14 \\ 10 \\ -8 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 24 \\ -20 \\ 8 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 19 \\ -16 \\ 13 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
